name: The Onion Quest
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 52

So I really wanted to implement an auto-chess type of game and the only way I could make this fit into the theme was to kinda have a garden/vegetable game. _I'm sorry_

How to play

  • Buy  Havest(?) vegetables by drag and dropping them on the board
  • Each vegetable has special abilities hover them and read their description
  • Fight your way to the evil onion and save the garden !

Notes:

  • What a great idea it was to try to balance this game in under 1 hour...
  • Yes You can probably manage to have one giant mushroom please send me a screen if you reach the boss with it 😂
  • Yes I forced the theme open 🤡
  • Sorry I couldn't have Godot compile my C# mess to HTML5...

Thanks:

Thanks to my sister Juliette for the graphism of all the vegetables ! (Check her hand-painted jackets they are amazing 😍)
